Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory545.jpg'}
{3: 'Conference room, Babylonia.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Sitting in a corner, Wells keeps his gaze on the Silver Falcon badge in his hand.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: 'The Gray Ravens are now around the coordinates provided by the Kurono test subject and have discovered the target flying fortress.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "A team of Task Force has been ordered to head down as support. Won't be long before Dark Aries arrives as well.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "Say what's on your mind, Wells. You've been quiet for far too long.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wells', 3: 'My apologies.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Wells', 3: "We've had all the information compiled. Aurora Squadron's main force is in the central flying fortress, but it's going to take us a while to break through the line of defense formed by all the smaller flying fortresses surrounding it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "That Construct by the name Echo... who's also the Kurono test subject, has made her way into one of the flying fortresses.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "We've constantly seen small flying vessels fall, and our guess is that it's the doing of said Construct.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'We need to be fast and get our hands on the data before they destroy...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wells', 3: "Kurono is aware of what's happening and has had a few private squads sent over with whatever excuses they can come up with, while having no time to cover up their action.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Speedy as always, huh.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Wells', 3: 'We have the upper hand because we made the first move this time. Our teams on Earth hit them when they were least expecting a hit.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wells', 3: 'But Kurono...', 4: '1'}
{3: "Wells clenches his fist around the Silver Falcon badge, feeling a twinge of pain as the badge's pointed end stabs into his palm."}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'All of this... will come to an end sooner or later.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory423.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'In the extravagantly furnished office, Collins opens his mouth to speak while absentmindedly going through the reports in hand, all the while not even looking up.'}
{2: 'Collins', 3: 'We sure... never imagined things to go this far. Say, is this what you had in mind?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Norman', 3: 'Well... never quite saw this coming, but we always play it by ear, right?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Norman seems to be reading the same reports.'}
{2: 'Norman', 3: "Well, true... but that's not without its risks.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Norman', 3: "Which is why I think I'll try to get Trojan back home soon before we find ourselves trapped in the swamp.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Norman', 3: "How's everything looking on your end, Collins?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Collins', 3: "Mediocre... but that's not something to ruffle our feathers.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Collins', 3: 'The best always comes last...', 4: '1'}
{3: "The terminal sitting on Collins' table beeps a few times as two encrypted files arrive."}
{2: 'Collins', 3: 'See... speak of the devil right there. Got one for you, too.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Norman', 3: "That's great... and let's hope this is good enough to finally make those geezers back home jump to their feet and do something.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Having gotten what he wanted, Norman cuts the line.'}
{3: 'Collins, however, takes no offense. He looks out the window—past which he seems able to see through space and see Earth beyond.'}
{2: 'Collins', 3: "Gotta say it's a shame that I don't get to be part of this cosmic act...", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory759.jpg'}
{3: "In Utopia's Control Room."}

{3: 'Standing upright in the middle of the control room, a test subject has numerous wires connected to their body, the machinery around them humming away. Pickman removes his gloves and fine-tunes one of the machines.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Utopia Researcher', 3: 'M.I.N.D. fusion... 100%.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Utopia Researcher', 3: 'Rejection reaction detected. Remaining consciousness about 71.03%.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Utopia Researcher', 3: 'Dr. Pickman... are you really sure about this?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'His tone is gentle but firm.'}
{2: 'Pickman', 3: 'This is going to be my greatest experiment yet, so it makes perfect sense that I validate it myself.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pickman', 3: 'You only get a fusion of M.I.N.D. so perfect and vast when the samples have lived by the same rules.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pickman', 3: 'And all the time and effort going into building this utopia... is finally paying off.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pickman', 3: "We're only one step away now...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pickman', 3: '...From finishing my greatest experiment yet.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Pickman keeps his gaze on his test subject, captivated and mesmerized.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Utopia Researcher', 3: 'But the follow-up...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pickman', 3: "I'll leave it to you, son.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pickman', 3: "You already know exactly what you need to do, don't you?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Utopia Researcher', 3: 'But...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Pickman lets out a quiet shush to stop the researcher from saying another word.'}
{2: 'Pickman', 3: "You know exactly what that place is like that we'll all find ourselves at, right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pickman', 3: "You and I and every single life there is... we'll see one another there again.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pickman', 3: "Now... let's get started.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Utopia Researcher', 3: '...Of course, Dr. Pickman... Teacher.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Pickman seems a little taken aback hearing the research call him this. Looking at the researcher—who goes way back with Pickman himself as his student—Pickman breaks into a faint smile.'}
{2: 'Pickman', 3: "Let's do it.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He walks into the vessel.'}
